reviewText: Danish sex films would get a whole lot better than this. While there is a lot of flesh on display, it is soft core all the way. What it lacks is a sense of humor that doesn't show up until the last third. The women are all beautiful and it is refreshing to see everyone relaxed and cheerful about all the sexual shenanigans. By the follow up (Since it was a massive world-wide hit) 'Without A Stitch II' the humor was there. Watching this now, the straight faced introduction is almost painful. Later, detailing the exploits of our heroine, things get more interesting. If you can stay awake that long...
Very good. I wish to buy 'Without a Stitch 2.'
Typical 70's Euro style soft porn. Pretty girl finds lots of excuses to take her clothes off. If that's what you're expecting this delivers perfectly.

I remember the newspaper ads for this film when I was going into the service, there were two neighborhood movie theaters, one showed "family" films, and the other showed more "mature" films.  I was in uniform, so I was able to see this film.
I was very glad to know it was available, and purchased it.

What can I say, but we were behind the curve when it came to being open about promiscuity. Foreign films like this are the basis for enjoying an era of movie making that was to me the best of the learning and experimentation period for any red blooded human. You can so relate to the emotions and actions being expressed in this story.

I will admit that I originally saw the movie when it first came out in 1970.  I got a hold of the DVD based on memories of my younger days.  It's one of those cute Danish/Swedish softcore films that were prevalent in that era.  There is ample female nudity, an inane plot but if you're interested in "hardcore" porn there is none of that.  It's a historical artifact.  The actress is cute and looks good sans clothes.  If you want to see a cute Danish blonde girl naked, this is the movie for you.  Otherwise, it doesn't have much to recommend.
